summary: This node allows you to interact with the Twitter API to perform actions such as creating tweets, sending direct messages, liking tweets, retweeting, and searching for tweets.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource you want to interact with (e.g., Direct Message or Tweet).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation you want to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Like, Retweet, Search).

parameters.name: user id
parameters.description: The ID of the user who should receive the direct message.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text of your Direct Message or status update. URL encode as necessary.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields for the operation, such as attachments or display coordinates.

parameters.text: Hello, this is a sample tweet!
